description: As taken from the HITRUST CSF, this section cover strategic risk managment items. Specifically in this cluster, the tags deal with the management of threats considered to be physical or environmental in nature (i.e. natural disasters).
name: PYS-ENV-PROTECTION

values.description: Security perimeters are defined and used to protect areas that contain either sensitive or critical information and information processing facilities.

kill_chain: Strategic Framework H:Physical AND Environmental Protection

values.value: OSRS CMCF Strategic Framework: 07.a Physical Security Perimeter
